column5: Have u tried not eating 4 hours before bed? If i eat anything less than 4 hours before i go to bed I wake up hungry. So thats how I control my waight. Swiching between eating before bed and not eating before bed.

Im on quetapin now. I only take 75 mg a day for slepping. Helps with the delusions and hallusinations i get at the end of the day to. I have been taking it for 6 moths now. It has helped me so much. I have gained one kilo. I have more energi to do things. Handel my emotions better. And it stopped me from having panic attaks and using benzo. I woulden switch meds for aniting in the world. Hope u have the same effects of using it. And do u take quetapin at the start of the day or at the end?
Go back on quetapin and lower the dose?
Both my doctors just say the psychologist has to be right. Saying they dont know to much about it.

But scrinks make falty diognoisis all the time. Its not like if your doctor says something it has to be true at all times. But also yes, my bf do not have a medical degree. Yet i feel like everyone who is contected to the internet can make an almoste as good diognoisis as a doctor. I found my diognoisis long before eny doctor did.
But what if I have them every night. Should my body be so exsousted every night?

I back talk my bf all the time to others. But confronted him once and he almost left me. I got super desperate and did every yhing in mye power to get him to stay. He after 2 hours of be beggim him to stay crying my heart out said ok. And nlw everyday I still think I have ro leave but dont say anything and i continue back talking him  to other people. But dont wanna be alone. I have alway been really depentent on having a bf, its one of the many symptoms of BPD. So I guess its just live with it. Try your best to move on quikly. Dont think about him. Forget he exsisted. Find someone else. And find someone who understands you have a illnes.
Done. üòé
Then try to wright the tings you like that you do down. If u took out the trash. Or gave someone a complement. You can always try to not be destructive. But thats hard.
U need to gather your toughts and just do it. Wright posetivs and negatives down. For him to also see. It will be easyer for both to see the hole perspectiv of how u think of things.
Try ketamin. The s ketamin. Its eye opening and works just as an antidepressant for 2 weeks afer you have tanken it

Hahaha yes. I used to be hypersexual. Now im not. My bf and I was used to fucking 5 times a day. Now today is the fist day in 3 weeks we fucked. And im so happy It finelly felt good again.
(my sex drive went down about a year ago) so hope it gets up again now. (this is probobly too personal but whatever üòÇ)
Hahaha yes. There is noting more exiting that researcing drugs to take. What have you tried?

When i took fluoxtin I just to get a 20 seconds trio just in the moment i would fall asleep. But the flouxtin alsow made me walk around more careless, and 90% zombie. Like I almoste quit school when i was on it. I just couldent see the point of anything on it. Made me not want any antidepressants ever again. But I am using 75mg qutapin for sleep and pykosis/hallusinations. (I get hallusinations when im overworked and exstreamly tired. But I can get that tired without doing anything else than thinking and lying in bed. I used to get hallusinations when I had been around 8-12 hours wake.

So i would recomend just trowing that nasty shit out the window. (unless it really works for you)

It really helped my mental state when i started to take qutapin. I went from having 14 panic attaks a day to zero in under a month. I think much straighter. Sleep less but in better quality. I take them 30min-1 hour before I want to sleep. In the beginning u will get a really dry mouth. But it stables after a month.
I had to quit my job. Havent worked in almoste a year. Depression is a bitch.

I watched chamber(s) on Netflix. And becase of it had a pykosis right after watching itüòÇ so i get easily influenced. Alsow wanted to kill myself more after watching 13 reasons why some years ago. Always tought it was just me. (sorry for bad english)
I hate birfthdays too. Its the day that I get reminded the most that I have noe friends.
Some people just arent fit to be parents. That really suck for the kid.

The party I went to yesterday, someone brought they 4 year old kid. A cat scratched him, so he started to cry. His day went over ti him, said "stop crying. Boys dont cry. Wanna be a man like dad?"
I got so pissed I talk to the mom, and said Boys should get to cry. But I was still so angry. And btw Who brings a 4 year old to a party? Anyway some dads are so unsentiv, thats one of the reason boys are afraid to show feelings.
Ik. Took a long time to decideüòÇ

Its better now. I added a pink background. Im trying to post the new pic.
Thank u. üòú
Thank you. üòä Im trying to just picture what is missing.
Its like thise abstrakt painting being sold for millions. So much going on, but still so colourfull and full of life.
I se so many different animals and faces. Its so pretty. But it can also look like they are all i agony and being boild alive.

Said i was suicidal. My dad said. Shut up, your not. Stop saying that, your so stupid some times. What have we ever done wrong. You dont have anything to be depressed about.

Said to my mom a year later i had 3 faild suicide attempts, and feel so shitty and sad all the time.
She said, why havent you said something before.
Said i allredy told dad a year earlyer , and that he denied it.
She was a littel pissed at my dad...
Its always temting, but dont shut yourself completly, and isolate. Try to get out of the apartment or house at least 30min a day. You stay as strong as you are right now.

I just found one that was fucked up to begin with. Im the most fucked up, but still evens out much. He is bipolar. When we both have the downs at the same time, i cant joke or talk about suicide. He will then say "ok, i will just jump of the balcony right now, im not even joking". So yeah funüòÇ

Omg YESSSS. I started when I was about the age of 8. Its very hard to keep going when your brain screams die all the time. Like from 40-5000 times a day.
I dont work, dont have energi for hobbies or anything. Cant eat. Cant sleep without a bigger and bigger amout of sleepingpills and people think Im selfish for wanting to end shit. Like bitch wanna trade feelings.
 Its always so much talk from others, dont do it. It would be selfish, and your worth it. Telling me that dosent make it better. I dont feel the like its worth it. And every day becomes a atcivment that I managed to live trough.

I have always been super obsest with having a boyfriend. I diddent feel like I was pretty enough if I diddent have one. Still dont feel pretty. I awoid mirrors. They almost always make me cry, and when i do I feel even worse, beacuse I then look so pathetic and ugly in the mirror.

The thing that helps me most is thinking that there is people that are uglyer than me. Like im not fat. Im very underwaight, but at least im not fat. 

Just try to notis ugly things about girls that are in realationships. And then u just convince yourself that you have a good personality. Or at least at some times. 

And the guy or girl of your dreams arent just gonna knock on your door. Its out there. And you cant expect someone to reah out. You have to try a littel. Everybody fails 70% of the time, but eventually you will get a good convo or even a date.
Me 3 times a week. XD the bigger happy mania i get, the harder the fall.
